pre_caption: This is a static, atmospheric scenery shot of a dark, wet city alleyway. The camera remains completely still, capturing the gritty urban environment. There is no movement from any subjects within the frame.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
original_caption: This is a static, atmospheric scenery shot of a dark, wet city alleyway. The camera remains completely still, capturing the gritty urban environment. There is no movement from any subjects within the frame.
initial_feedback: 1. 为了防止歧义，删去static，因为camera有move forward，只是场景中大部分是静止的，只有dark, wet city alleyway远处有一个行人向frame左侧走过消失
gpt_feedback: To avoid ambiguity, consider removing the term "static" from the caption. Although the camera does move forward, most of the scene remains still. Additionally, there is a pedestrian walking towards the left side of the frame in the distance of the dark, wet city alleyway.
final_feedback: To avoid ambiguity, consider removing the term "static" from the caption. Although the camera does move forward, most of the scene remains still. Additionally, there is a pedestrian walking towards the left side of the frame in the distance of the dark, wet city alleyway.
gpt_caption: This is an atmospheric scenery shot of a dark, wet city alleyway. The camera moves forward slightly, capturing the gritty urban environment. Most of the scene remains still, but there is a pedestrian walking towards the left side of the frame in the distance.
final_caption: This is an atmospheric scenery shot of a dark, wet city alleyway. The camera moves forward slightly, capturing the gritty urban environment. Most of the scene remains still, but there is a pedestrian walking towards the left side of the frame in the distance.
